#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<cstdio>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main(void)
{
int T;
int res;
int len,i;
string input;
scanf("%d",&T);
 
while(T--)
{
  cin>>input;
  len = input.length();
 
  for(i=0;i<len;i++)
  {
 
    if(input[i] == '1')
    {
       res = 100  + 10 * (input[i+1]-'0') +  (input[i+2]-'0');
       i= i+2;
    }
    else
    {
       res = 10 * (input[i]-'0') + (input[i+1]-'0');
       i++;
    }
    printf("%c",(char)res);
  }
  printf("\n");
}
}
